events.comment: Destroy initial star and enemy objects

If the player is touching the screen, move towards the touch position. Only move the player if they are further away from the touch than it is going to move - this avoids an unpleasent jittering when reaching the touch position.
Make a random enemy shoot every 1 second.
If any enemies are above the player, make the player automatically shoot 10 times a second.
If an enemy bullet hits the player, just destroy the bullet.
Destroy the initial star object in the layout.
Create 50 random stars with different speeds and sizes on startup to create a space background effect. The stars have a wrap behavior which keeps them on-screen.

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Pilots. We need you now more than ever."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "After last week's snafu in responding to the civil disobedience in Sector 84,"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Planet Friendly is now the only habitable planet left in the WHOLE UNIVERSE!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "For our people to have any chance at survival, we must take over Planet Friendly."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Unfortunately, the selfish Friendlians are onto us, and are preparing to defend themselves."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You must destroy them and secure Planet Friendly for us. We only have one shot."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Copy that, Mr. President. Lock and load. Let's kick some Friendly ass."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "But at what cost? What, in the end, are we saving, if we sacrifce our humanity?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Save the philosophizing for the victory party, partner. We've got a planet to conquer."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Planet Friendly has an abundance of wildlife and vegetation."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "If we work together, surely we can all share in its many resources."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "How stupid do you think we are, Ambassador Pleasant? We've heard that one before."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "To be fair, we've never actually taken anyone up on it."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Oh please! The citizens of Planet Friendly are a peaceful people."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "If this is truly the last hope for life in the galaxy,"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "isn't it finally time we set aside the old ways of war and come together in unity?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Think of our children, and your children. What kind of universe do you want to pass on to them?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "And to their children? And their children's children?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "We can end the violence here and now, and start anew as one unified people."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "My God. To think we could actually end the cycle of violence if we just came together."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Could this truly be the moment we turn the page to a peaceful co-existence?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "What's going on out there? Why isn't anything exploding?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The Friendlian Ambassador is trying to tell us we can all share the planet."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "That's loser talk. Destroy Ambassador Pleasant and conquer Planet Friendly. That's an order."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Fine. I'll take care of it myself."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Fine. If fighting is all you know, then fighting is what you'll get."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "We of Planet Friendly may be peaceful, but we will defend our home to the death!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Well. There you have it. There's nowhere in the universe for our people, or anyone, to live."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Well, that's a kick in the pants."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "I'm going to get drunk. Enjoy however much oxygen you each have left."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You've done it! Great work, Pilots! You've secured Planet Friendly!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "And now, what are we to do? Settle down and live out our days in peace?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Just forget all the atrocities we've committed to acquire this new home?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "I can't do it. Self-destructing in three, two, one..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Good riddance. That guy was a drag."
